content.rendered:
Advancement Strategies and Services plays an important part in the University of La Verne’s ability to achieve its outreach, fundraising, event, and stewardship goals. We also support the division’s mission of creating and strengthening effective relationships. We meet those commitments by ensuring the integrity of every gift and demographic update in our database.

Internal Resources

  • Biographical Update Request Form
  • Confidentiality Agreement
  • Data Request Form
  • Gift Acceptance Form
  • Gift in Kind Acceptance Form
  • Golf Tournament Sponsorship Gift/Pledge Acceptance Form
  • Planned Giving Pledge Acceptance Form
  • Prospect Research Request Form
  • Scholarship Gala Sponsorship Gift/Pledge Acceptance Form
  • UA Project Request Form

Team

Hannah Palpant
Senior Director of Advancement Strategies and Services
(909) 448-4162

Claudia Gonzalez
Director of Advancement Services
(909) 448-4586

Russel Heskin
Director of Donor Relations
(909) 448-4582

Nancy Ramirez
Prospect Researcher and Biographical Data Analyst
(909) 448-4688

Annabel Gonzalez
Senior Gift Processor
(909) 448-4682
